    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur bibendum ornare dolor, quis ullamcorper ligula sodales.
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chat-page', templateUrl: './chat-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chat-page.component.css'] }) export class ChatPageComponent implements OnInit { constructor(){}; ngOnInit(): void { const storeMessages= localStorage.getItem('') } message:any; messages: any[] = []; sendMessage(){ this.messages.push(this.message); this.message = ''; // clear the input filed after sending the message //save message to local storage localStorage.setItem('messages',JSON.stringify(this.messages)); } }
